lead_paragraph: The short-term rental company has been facing criticism that some hosts reject renters based on race, religion, gender, ethnicity, age or disability.

headline.print_headline: Airbnb Has Enlisted Hosts; Now It Must Fight Their Bias
headline.main: Airbnb Adopts Rules to Fight Discrimination by Its Hosts

snippet: The short-term rental company has been facing criticism that some hosts reject renters based on race, religion, gender, ethnicity, age or disability....
abstract: Airbnb announces several measures to reduce discrimination on part of hosts who use its service, including instituting new nondiscrimination policy and reducing prominence of user photographs; moves are most forceful actions company has taken to date since surfacing of complaints about hosts rejecting renters based on race, age, gender or other factors.
